## Introduction

This page analyzes changes in life expectancy, GDP per capita, and population over time for Canada using the Gapminder dataset.

```{python}
#| echo: true
#| warning: false
#| message: false

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

country_name = "Canada"
country_df = df[df["country"] == country_name].sort_values("year")

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["life_expectancy"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.title(f"Life Expectancy Over Time in {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["gdp_per_capita"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.title(f"GDP per Capita Over Time in {country_name}")
plt.show()

plt.figure()
plt.plot(country_df["year"], country_df["population_millions"])
plt.xlabel("Year")
plt.ylabel("Population (Millions)")
plt.title(f"Population Over Time in {country_name}")
plt.show()
```
